Text: Right people if your going to play this on ps3 it has a Cinavia watermark which mutes the audio so don't bother downloading if you plan to watch it on ps3.
Biders, thanks for the heads up.  That was my plan.  Do you know if it's the same for Xbox?  Is there anyway around this?  Sorry didn't mean to pound you with so many questions.
you can play it on ps3 if you tweak some of the audio output settings. I dont wanna take credit as I didnt find it out but if you look at the other releases you should find an answer.

thnks for the included subs :D
saves me some time
